content: *christmas decoration galore pattern includes snowflakes and bells to hang on your tree and edging to decorate the skirt shown in patons grace * patons grace 50 g/1 75 oz 1 ball will make 10 snowflakes size 3 25 mm u s 3 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge crochet thread stiffener written directions are provided in pdf download may 2009 similar patterns open chain loop snowflake 1 almost the same but has some minor differences crocheted snowflake ornament 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/open-chain-loop-snowflake 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/crocheted-snowflake-ornament
